fields.name: Effect:
fields.value: Disguises as an attack on another player. Grabs the target's defense card if defended.

fields.name: Upgraded:
fields.value:
Disguises as 3 attacks on another player. Grabs the target's defense card(s) if defended.

*This does no damage if it is not defended against. Takes an unmodified version of the defense card. Each disguised attack can grab only 1 defense card. Grabbed mechanically means their defense card was not played. The target player will learn they were Grabbed.*
